text: Those whose life is long still strive for gain, and for all mortals all things take second place to money.
author: Sophocles

text: I've always thought anyone can make money. Making a life worth living, that's the real test.
author: Robert Fulghum

text: It's very important that every movie I do makes money because I want the people that had the faith in me to get their money back.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: We need transparency in government spending. We need to put each government expenditure online so every Floridian can see where their tax money is being spent.
author: Marco Rubio
